item.title: About
item.description:
Hello There

Hello, my name is Faisal, I am a UI/UX designer from Lombok, Indonesia. I’ve been a Freelance UI/UX Designer for over 3 years, and I use Figma to create all my designs. graduated from one of the IT-based campuses in Mataram with a satisfactory predicate with a major in Computer Science with a bachelor’s degree.
